distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ffmpeg-4 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-3341: Fixed a potential crash when processing a crafted
  NUT stream (bsc#1206778).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A null pointer dereference issue was discovered in 'FFmpeg' in decode_main_header() function of libavformat/nutdec.c file. The flaw occurs because the function lacks check of the return value of avformat_new_stream() and triggers the null pointer dereference error, causing an application to crash.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
